title: Newegg is making it easier to buy your ideal NAS
description: Build-your-own NAS drives have never been this easy, but you’ll have to make do with a select few manufacturers for now.

title: You can now buy LG’s new Dolby Atmos soundbars that play nice with PS5
description: LG's new soundbars offer a range of features designed for movie fans and gamers, and one model comes with a new integrated stand for LG C-series OLED TVs.

title: Bitcoin ATMs drained after hackers exploit zero-day bug
description: Hackers stole 56 bitcoin, worth around $1.5 million, by targeting ATM flaws.

description: Intel's Arc lead engineer Raja Koduri is no longer with the company, and it just might be the reset Team Blue needs for its next-gen GPUs.

title: Lionsgate streaming platform leaks data of 37 million users
description: An unprotected ElasticSearch instance was found holding Lionsgate user IP addresses and other data.

title: OnePlus teases OnePlus 11 made from ‘unprecedented materials’
